remarks: Dirac bra-ket associative law ` ( | A >. ` ` <. B | ) ( | C >. ` ` <. D | ) = | A >. ` ` ( <. B | ( | C >. ` ` <. D | ) ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 30-May-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: kbass6 $p |- ( ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) /\ ( C e. ~H /\ D e. ~H ) ) -> ( ( A ketbra B ) o. ( C ketbra D ) ) = ( A ketbra ( `' bra ` ( ( bra ` B ) o. ( C ketbra D ) ) ) ) ) $.
